name: places/ChIJOU7Fih70wokRVRc-RQHijSI
formattedAddress: 1454 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1454 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text:
Marni Lechner from Apicella & Schlesinger Attorneys At Law is an absolutely incredible lawyer! I cannot emphasize enough how much she has helped me. Not only is she highly professional and knowledgeable, but she is also an incredibly caring and compassionate person. Whenever I have had legal questions or concerns, she has always been there for me, providing guidance and support. She takes the time to explain everything in detail and ensures that I fully understand my options.

One thing that truly sets Marni apart is her dedication to her clients. She fights tirelessly on their behalf, going above and beyond to achieve the best possible outcomes. She has built a strong relationship with me, making me feel valued and heard. Even beyond our professional interactions, she has offered friendly advice and connected me with her colleagues who could provide additional assistance when needed.

I am truly grateful for Marni's expertise and support. Her commitment to her clients is unmatched, and I highly recommend her services. If you're looking for a lawyer who is not only highly skilled but also genuinely cares about your well-being, Marni Lechner is the one to choose. She is an absolute gem in the legal field!

originalText.text: Marni has to be the most helpful attorney I ever came across. From the moment I spoke to her, the care and compassion she has had towards me and my family has been amazing. She is someone you want in your corner if you are dealing with a legal matter. Would recommend 1000%!

text.text: Marni has to be the most helpful attorney I ever came across. From the moment I spoke to her, the care and compassion she has had towards me and my family has been amazing. She is someone you want in your corner if you are dealing with a legal matter. Would recommend 1000%!

originalText.text: I have been going to Ms. Schlesinger for legal matters for nearly two decades. She is always knowledgeable, fair and treats everyone with respect. She is also the rare attorney that listens to her clients, cares about them and is result oriented. I recommend her highly.

text.text: I have been going to Ms. Schlesinger for legal matters for nearly two decades. She is always knowledgeable, fair and treats everyone with respect. She is also the rare attorney that listens to her clients, cares about them and is result oriented. I recommend her highly.

originalText.text: Was looking for help and stumbled onto marni didn't look hard figured my case was solid as I have evidence of being assaulted by ticket agents. She strung me along this journey believing she'll represent me until about a week left to file foil report. Which is all she helped me with before dropping me saying she can't take the case. Although I was upset about my ticket and arguing with ticket agent him putting hands on me and continuously assaulting me while I'm being held was not necessary at all yet no one could come to my defense. This taught me not to rely on others to help and next time just take matters into my own hands. Point being the one who assaulted me didn't get disciplined while I had to take classes and was in the bookings for a night. Justice was never serve for these tyrants.

originalText.text:
The attorneys of this office will always go beyond the call of duty, just being your lawyer, isn't  Here is what you will receive Unlike most attornies, calls will be returned promptly, and the level of legal protection is incomparable, guidance is continuous, Marnie Schelinger and her father (Phil), also an attorney will treat you like a member of their family, they will listen to  you in detail, explain, guide, and care about your legal matters from the beginning to the end night and day, no matter who the opponent will be they will  represent you fully, I praise God for these attornies for whom without I would have been in a "hot mess" and believe me I have a had many a legal issue in this great city of ours, and  I would recommend anyone to entertain the thought of retaining the services of this firm, experience, familiarity of the law is plentiful, you will have no regrets, this a winning team of lawyers who will fight for you no matter what, I have been dealing with this firm since (2012)

Henry B
